cherish.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if you cherish something, it is very important to you
cherish.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I cherish the memory of that day.
cherish a hope/an idea/a dream etc
cherish.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to love someone or something very much and take care of them well
cherish.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: In marriage, a man promises to cherish his wife.
